name: sfb-web-app
description: This is where the code of the web app client is, here we are going to code or app and when finished build it for production.

scripts.up-dev: docker rm mbi-web-app-dev || true && docker container run -p 4000:4000 --name mbi-web-app --network=mbi-network -ti --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)",target=/usr/app/src mbi-web-app-dev
scripts.web-start-dev: npx babel ./app --out-dir ./app-build --plugins=babel-plugin-cerebral && env $(cat env/.dev.env | grep -v ^# | xargs) nodemon ./render-server/server.js & npx babel ./app --watch --out-dir ./app-build --plugins=babel-plugin-cerebral
